data.text: @skyisblue34 @JaalaPulford @BurnetInstitute @TheDohertyInst @UniMelb @BarreSinoussi And Dan's advice not to view sunsets too.

@JaalaPulford @BurnetInstitute @TheDohertyInst @UniMelb @BarreSinoussi Community, equity and trust are nice buzzwords, but the response in Australia was actually a policing-led authoritarian shredding of our human rights, trapping tens of thousands of citizens in harmâ€™s way, breaking up families, wrecking livelihoods.

@discoball2000 @kazza264 @JaalaPulford @BurnetInstitute @TheDohertyInst @UniMelb @BarreSinoussi Kazza, Dan's biggest cheerleader all throughout the pandemic. According to her, he managed it brilliantly and we owe the fact we're not dead, to him.
@discoball2000 @colourmeamused_ @JaalaPulford @BurnetInstitute @TheDohertyInst @UniMelb @BarreSinoussi You forgot the ring of steel.
@JaalaPulford @BurnetInstitute @TheDohertyInst @UniMelb @BarreSinoussi I really think it was closing the playgrounds that saved us here in Vic
@JaalaPulford @BurnetInstitute @TheDohertyInst @UniMelb @BarreSinoussi Lessons learnt was you're all bought and paid for evil shits

@discoball2000 @kazza264 @JaalaPulford @BurnetInstitute @TheDohertyInst @UniMelb @BarreSinoussi Also bc we had one approach - LOCKDOWN without any thought to the consequences of this policy in terms of other diseases, MH, DV, FV, education or the financial position ppl at an individual & state level find ourselves in

@JaalaPulford @BurnetInstitute @TheDohertyInst @UniMelb @BarreSinoussi @JikkyKjj No DNA integration for the Sars-Cov2 you say? Only possibly the spike from the 💉 you've forced people to take? The simple fact it may be integrated into the host genome and affect the integrity of genomic DNA should be enough to warrant concern....
